title: Textile, 1960
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: embroidered in satin stitch on tabby weave.
description: Long narrow panel, width of goods, of dark blue cotton, tabby weave, rather open. Embroidered in white cotton and light blue cotton. Fifteen different sections, each in characteristic Japanese geometric design, separated by narrow bands of geometric border designs worked in blue. Satin and laid satin stitches.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1960.Medium: cotton
Technique: embroidered in satin stitch on tabby weave.. 1960-157-2.
